topic.title: LwDITA capabilities
topic.shortdesc: LwDITA shares some core capabilities for content structure and reuse with DITA 1.3. By design, it includes fewer capabilities than full DITA XML. LwDITA also includes some unique cross-format features.

dd.p: In LwDITA, the document type of map functions as a content collection and organization mechanism. LwDITA maps can be created in the XDITA, HDITA, and MDITA authoring formats, and they allow for cross-format collection and organization. For example, a map authored in XDITA can collect and organize topics created in any combination of LwDITA formats and even in DITA XML. The same can be accomplished with maps authored in HDITA and MDITA. LwDITA maps also can define the navigation or table of contents for a deliverable.
